title: Issue with riot connection routing *IMPORTANT*
body:
I have been having an issue lately with my connection to the game servers. I live in northern Ohio, and get around 65-70ms, which is an obvious problem. My initial thought was that I had something on my computer that was affecting my connection. However, after asking around and some calls to my ISP, I was made aware that it was issue that was native to my local area. I asked my ISP what the fix would be for this issue, and they informed me that there is little they can do considering that my connection to the hop prior to riot game servers was around 15ms. I ran a trace route in hopes to find the issue:

Tracing route to 104.160.131.1 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1     1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  192.168.0.1
  2    16 ms    19 ms     8 ms  10.24.0.1
  3    16 ms    17 ms    10 ms  72.240.7.61
  4    18 ms    18 ms     9 ms  72.240.111.29
  5    10 ms    12 ms     6 ms  72.240.111.49
  6    22 ms    24 ms    16 ms  xe-10-3-2.bar2.Detroit1.Level3.net [4.53.74.101]
  7    20 ms    15 ms    13 ms  ae-2-3603.ear3.Chicago2.Level3.net [4.69.159.186]
  8    52 ms    59 ms    55 ms  104.160.131.1

Trace complete.

As you can see the hop that is posing the issue is between 7-8. This has been a problem for around ~6 months, and is quite annoying. I have made calls to my ISP and Level3 (The people routing my connection) and they all have said this would be an issue that Riot Games would need to resolve. This is an issue with everyone is our area, so I would hope that this issue would be of utmost importance. 
Thanks in advance. (I hope)

_**Additional Information**_: My ISP is Buckeye Cable System, and the people who route the connection are Level3 Communications.

_**PS:**_ For full disclosure, I ran another Trace Route to the alternate Riot IP:

Tracing route to 104.160.131.3 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1     1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  192.168.0.1
  2    12 ms    12 ms     7 ms  10.24.0.1
  3    21 ms    17 ms    13 ms  72.240.7.61
  4    24 ms    19 ms    13 ms  72.240.111.29
  5    12 ms    11 ms    12 ms  72.240.111.49
  6    48 ms     *       24 ms  xe-10-3-2.bar2.Detroit1.Level3.net [4.53.74.101]
  7    17 ms    17 ms    18 ms  ae-2-3603.ear3.Chicago2.Level3.net [4.69.159.186]
  8    49 ms    56 ms    49 ms  4.15.84.86
  9    50 ms    53 ms    47 ms  104.160.131.3

Trace complete.

replies.body: Thanks for all of this detailed information.  We've been looking into these issues and found that a network provider is undergoing maintenance.  Ranked has been disabled in the meantime, and will be providing updates through our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Hang tight until then!
Hello? pls unmark as resolved and read the post...

Sorry for the delay, I was away and it looks like Targons Blade replied to your other post.  Was your ISP able to look into this for you?

Boards aren't an alternative to the ticketing system, so there isn't anything here that is marked as solved.  

If you're still having issues, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help you individually.  Make sure to include the info you've provided with the routing as well as additional logs from our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
No, this is an ongoing problem. It's been happening for the last 6 months
Has nothing to do with the recent disconnects.

Having issues as well in Iowa.  latency during game is normally 40ms, but on weekdays between 6:00pm and Midnight CST latency is around 150ms and on weekends is pretty much 150ms all the time.  ISP just told me the there is nothing they can do about the issue as the problem, based off of WinMTR data, is outside of their network.  I'm curious if it's actually something on Riot's end.  Have a ticket open as well, no response yet.

Unfortunately, It would seem that riot deemed this post as resolved due to a Rioter comment. Please Upvote new post over at: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/4nLALjEj-issue-with-riot-connection-routing-important
